CustomField.formula:
CASE(TEXT( Equity_configure__c ), "We haven’t incorporated this yet.", 0, "Learning activities have limited customized features.", 1, "Learning activities are highly customizable.", 2, "Learning activities are highly customizable with resources that are culturally relevant by race and income.", 3, 0)
+
CASE(TEXT( Equity_data__c ), "We haven’t incorporated this yet.", 0, "There are less than 2 research studies that include student outcomes evidence by race and income.", 1, "There are 2 or more research studies that include student outcomes evidence by race and income.", 2, "The product incorporates research on student outcomes reported by race and income and shares transparently how evidence is incorporated into design, implementation, and continuous improvement.", 3, 0)
+
CASE(TEXT( Equity_language__c ), "We haven’t incorporated this yet.", 0, "Our product uses language that reflects diversity, but does not use equity-minded language to address systemic barriers affecting student populations.", 1, "Our product uses limited equity-minded language.", 2, "Our product uses equity-minded language throughout.", 3, 0)
+
CASE(TEXT( Equity_relevant__c ), "We haven’t incorporated this yet.", 0, "There are very few social, emotional, and academic supports.", 1, "Social, emotional, and academic supports are customizable and embedded throughout the tool.", 2, "Social, emotional, and academic supports tools are customizable and embedded throughout, are culturally relevant, and focus on students’ strengths rather than perceived inadequacies.", 3, 0)
+
CASE(TEXT( Equity_research__c ), "We haven’t incorporated this yet.", 0, "There are few research citations for the design of the digital learning tools.", 1, "Research is shared and is transparent with respect to the design process of the digital learning product.", 2, "Research used to inform the design is shared and considers student populations by race and income.", 3, 0)
+
CASE(TEXT( Equity_stories__c ), "We haven’t incorporated this yet.", 0, "Student images and stories are referenced in the product.", 1, "Student images and stories are an essential feature of the product.", 2, "Student images and stories are an essential feature of the product and are representative of a range of student populations by race, income, and intersectional identities.", 3, 0)
CustomField.label: Equity Score
